mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, c.commentCode,c.boardCode, c.userCode,c.commentContent,c.commentDate FROM commenttbl c JOIN usertbl u ON c.userCode = u.userCode WHERE c.boardCode = #{boardCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commenttbl(boardCode, userCode, commentContent, commentDate) VALUE ( #{boardCode}, #{userCode}, #{commentContent},now())
